title: LG French Door Refrigerator LFXS30796ST
description:
In this video we take a closer look at LG's innovative InstaView French door refrigerator model LFXS30796.  For more details or to place an order please visit us at Abt.com: http://www.abt.com/product/107855/LG-30-Cu.-Ft.-Stainless-Steel-InstaView-Door-In-Door-French-Door-Refrigerator-LFXS30796S.html?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=LFXS30796ST_2017051 

Features:
- Capacity:
Refrigerator: 19.50 cu. ft.
Freezer: 10.10 cu. ft.
Total: 29.6 cu. ft.
- Features
InstaView™ Door-in-Door® w/ ColdSaver™ Panel: Yes (w/ Glass Panel)
ENERGY STAR® Qualified: Yes (784 kWh/Year)
Ice & Water Dispenser
Ice System: Slim SpacePlus®
Daily Ice Production: 4.5 lbs/4.9 IcePlus
Ice Storage Capacity: 3.0lbs + 4.0lbs
Smart Cooling Plus System
Multi Air Flow Cooling
Temperature Sensors: 8
Linear Compressor: Yes
Fresh Air Filter Model LT120F
Dual Evaporator
Smooth Touch Control Display(White LED)
- Convenience
Temperature Controls: Electronic/Digital
Door Alarm
Child Lock
LoDecibel™ Quiet Operation
SmartDiagnosis
Auto Closing Door Hinge
- Refrigerator
No. of Shelves: 4 Split (3 Fixed/1 Folding)
Folding Shelf
Cantilevered Shelves
Spill Protector™ Tempered Glass
2 Crispers/1 Bonus Drawer
Glide N’ Serve® Drawer
Glide N' Access® Shelf
Refrigerator Light: Premium LED (Ceiling and Side)
- Refrigerator Door
No. of Shelves/Bin: 7 Total (Including Door-in-Door®)
Door Bin Construction: Clear , Opaque, Silver Deco
Dairy Corner
